title: Revenue of the New England Patriots ( NFL ) 2001 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 600.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 523.0 was reported at Year 2015
